sequence:
Lively Afternoon Tea Party VI

<size=45>「The Elegant Bluff」</size>

scripts.say: A few days prior to the tea party.
Cygnet, what are you and Edinburgh doing? Your faces are all dirty, come here and let me wipe off the dirt.
Ack! Ah! That...
We are adding tea leaves to our baked sweet potatoes, do you want to try, Hood?
Baked sweet potatoes? Can I have a taste?
Umm, the food prepared at my home tastes far worse than those snacks prepared by Belfast, and...
Hood, this was freshly roasted.
W-wait! Let us go wash them first...
You didn't wash it before you eat it? That’s alright, just enjoy its original flavour.
That, umm, those all got dirty...
Hmm? Your hands will get stained, but this is part of the enjoyment of eating this dish. Cygnet, you didn’t….
… So, umm, how does it taste?!
Yes… very delicious, the sweetness is just right.~
R-really? We thought that peeling sweet potatoes would be below what the eloquent Hood would tolerate to do.
(Laughs) Who exactly do you think I am? If peeling sweet potatoes is below me, then that kind of eloquence—— must be some kind of bluff.
That’s right, that’s right! Hood, let me teach you how to roast them.~
Belfast is so busy she refused to come out to roast sweet potatoes! Honestly, if only she can be as understanding as you are——
Miss Belfast, she has too many things tied to her kind heart...
Really? As her sister, I cannot tell.
Most likely because whenever Miss Belfast is around you, she is most relaxed.
Really… hehe, it really can't be helped. I guess I'll take some sweet potatoes home for her——
Umm… quickly eat them, when they get cold they'll taste not as good...
Back to the tea party——
Slowly but surely, the fallen leaves are beginning to pile up in the courtyard...
After all, autumn is the season of fallen leaves.
The fall… naturally a good time to gather with everyone. Let’s all roast some sweet potatoes!
Roast sweet potatoes? Edinburgh can finally show off her prowess!
These are not a good match to be served for afternoon tea.
When no one is available to make food or go out to buy snacks for the tea party, then roasting sweet potatoes is the easiest option!
Belfast, are you coming? Let’s gather up all the leaves and I will light up a bonfire.
Hehe, all this smoke… really——
Belfast, this looks fun, let’s join them!
Our afternoon tea etiquette——
Ha, this is called sharing happiness with commoners. On occasion, we should mingle and do what the common folk are doing.~
Your Majesty, let me teach you how to roast these.~
At the same time, {namecode:11}...
[South Latitude 71° West Longitude 100°]
A continent covered in snow… The map is reliable as expected. This is the North Union! {namecode:12}, rest assured, I am here to get you!
